We Advocate For The Rights Of Pedestrian Victims

When a pedestrian is hit by a motor vehicle, the injuries are almost always serious or even catastrophic. For that reason, drivers have a responsibility to be especially watchful around pedestrians.

If you were hit in a pedestrian crossing, in a bike lane, on a sidewalk or anywhere on the road in the Columbus, Ohio, area, our auto accident injury lawyers have the experience and skill to effectively represent you.

Why Choose Us If You Were Involved In A Pedestrian Accident?

Our legal team at Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, has extensive experience handling these claims. We provide:

  • Stellar investigative skills. We will find and interview witnesses, review police reports and learn as much as we can about the circumstances of your accident.
  • Medical treatment monitoring: We will monitor your medical treatment to ensure that you are getting the care your injuries require so that you can put your life back in order.
  • Trial preparation: Your lawyer will spend the time and resources to ensure that you get the compensation you need and even take your case to trial if necessary.
  • Personal attention during all stages of your case: You will receive personal attention from your attorney from the time of your first phone call or visit. You will always be kept informed about the status of your case.

Wrongful Death Claims

If a pedestrian accident involves a fatality, our staff has the expertise to handle wrongful death claims.

Call For A Free Consultation: 614-360-2706

Our law firm has represented injured people and the families of wrongful death victims in Columbus and throughout Ohio for 50 years.

Call us today to schedule a free consultation. There are no legal fees unless we recover compensation for you. You can also send us an email.
